CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL($User.UserType, 'PowerPartner'), HYPERLINK("/partners/s/markpriority?c__recordId="+Id, "Click to Mark Priority", "_self"), HYPERLINK("/lightning/cmp/c__markLoanApplicationAsPriority?c__recordId="+Id, "Click to Mark Priority", "_self"))
CustomField.label: Mark Priority
